## types.Split type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Split<S extends string, SEP extends string> = Equal<S, string> extends true ? S[] : S extends `${infer P}${SEP}${infer RT}` ? [P, ...Split<RT, SEP>] : S extends "" ? SEP extends "" ? [] : [S] : [S];
```
